spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Acererak és un llançador de conjurs de nivell 20. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència ({@dc 23} salvada de conjur, {@hit 15} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Acererak carries the {@item Staff of the Forgotten One|ToA}. He wears a {@item Talisman of the Sphere} and has a {@item Sphere of Annihilation} under his control.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Acererak falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Rejovenir
entries: Acererak's body turns to dust when he drops to 0 hit points, and his equipment is left behind. Acererak gains a new body after {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all his hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of Acererak's phylactery, the location of which is hidden.

trait.name: Resistir l'Expulsió
entries: Acererak té avantatge a salvar contra efectes que expulsin no-morts.

action.name: Paralyzing Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 15} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 20} o be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Staff (+3 Quarterstaff)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany contundent mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic, o 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany contundent mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic si s'usa amb dos mans.

action.name: Invoke Curse
entries: While holding the Staff of the Forgotten One, Acererak expends 1 charge from it and targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 23} or be cursed. Until the curse is ended, the target can't regain hit points and has vulnerability to necrotic damage. {@spell Greater restoration}, {@spell remove curse}, or similar magic ends the curse on the target.

legendary.name: At-Will Spell
entries: Acererak casts one of his at-will spells.

legendary.name: Melee Attack
entries: Acererak uses Paralyzing Touch or makes one melee attack with his staff.

legendary.name: Frightening Gaze (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Acererak fixes his gaze on one creature he can see within 10 feet of him. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 20} against this magic or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. L'objectiu {@condition frightened} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target its immune to Acererak's gaze for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Talisman of the Sphere (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Acererak uses his {@item Talisman of the Sphere} to move the {@item Sphere of Annihilation} under his control up to 90 feet.

legendary.name: Disrupt Life (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Each creature within 20 feet of Acererak ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 20} against this magic. Qui falli rep 42 ({@damage 12d6}) de dany necròtic; si supera, en rep la meitat.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The dwarf és Saviesa. Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: The dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: The dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The aldani pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The aldani fa dos atacs with its claws.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany tallant, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 11} per escapar). The aldani has two claws, each of which can grapple only un objectiu.

trait.name: Sentits Aguts
entries: The almiraj has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda o la vista.

trait.name: Familiar
entries: With the DM's permission, the {@spell find familiar} spell can summon an almiraj.

action.name: Horn
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Resiliència No-morta
entries: Si hi ha dany que redueix al zombi a 0 punts de cop, ha de salvar Constitució amb CD de 5 + el dany rebut (si el dany no és radiant o crític). Si supera, el zombi es queda amb 1 punt de cop i no 0.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 14} or be knocked {@condition prone}.

immune.preNote: While wearing the Ring of Winter:

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Artus wears the {@item Ring of Winter|toa}. He and the ring can't be targeted by divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors. While attuned to and wearing the ring, Artus ceases to age and is immune to cold damage and the effects of extreme cold.

Artus wields {@item Bookmark|toa} a +3 dagger with additional magical properties. As a bonus action, Artus can activate any one of the following properties while attuned to the dagger, provided he has the weapon drawn:

items: Cause a blue gem set into the dagger's pommel to shed bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet, or make the gem go dark.
Turn the dagger into a compass that, while resting on your palm, points north.
Cast {@spell porta dimensional} from the dagger. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

Cast {@spell compulsion} (save {@dc 15}) from the dagger. The range of the spell increases to 90 feet but it targets only spiders that are beasts. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Artus fa tres atacs with Bookmark or his longbow.

action.name: Bookmark (+3 Dagger)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Ring of Winter
entries: The Ring of Winter has 12 charges and regains all its expended charges daily at dawn. While attuned to and wearing the ring, Artus can expend the necessary number of charges to activate one of the following properties:

items: Artus can expend 1 charge and use the ring to lower the temperature in a 120-foot-radius sphere centered on a point he can see within 300 feet of him. The temperature in that area drops 20 degrees per minute, to a minimum of −30 degrees Fahrenheit. Frost and ice begin to form on surfaces once the temperature drops below 32 degrees. This effect is permanent unless Artus uses the ring to end the effect as an action, at which point the temperature in the area returns to normal at a rate of 10 degrees per minute.

Artus can cast one of the following spells from the ring ({@dc 17} salvació de conjur) by expending the necessary number of charges: {@spell Bigby's hand} (2 charges) the hand is made of ice, is immune to cold damage, and deals dany contundent instead of force damage as a clenched fist, {@spell cone of cold} (2 charges), {@spell flesh to stone||flesh to ice} (3 charges); as flesh to stone except that the target turns to solid ice with the density and durability of stone, {@spell ice storm} (2 charges), {@spell Otiluke's freezing sphere} (3 charges), {@spell sleet storm} (1 charge), {@spell spike growth} (1 charge) the spikes are made of ice, or {@spell wall of ice} (2 charges).

Artus can expend the necessary number of charges and use the ring to create either an inanimate ice object (2 charges) or an animated ice creature (4 charges). The ice object can't have any moving parts, must be able to fit inside a 10-foot cube, and has the density and durability of metal or stone (Artus's choice). The ice creature must be modeled after a beast with a challenge rating of 2 or less. The ice creature has the same statistics as the beast it models, with the following changes: the creature is a construct with vulnerability to fire damage, immunity to cold and poison damage, and immunity to the following conditions: {@condition charmed}, {@condition exhaustion}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition petrified}, and {@condition poisoned}. The ice creature obeys only its creator's commands. The object or creature appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of Artus. It melts into a pool of normal water after 24 hours or when it drops to 0 hit points. In extreme heat, it loses 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hit points per minute as it melts. Use the guidelines in chapter 8 of the Dungeon Master's Guide to determine the hit points of an inanimate object if they become necessary.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Asharra és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de druida preparats:

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the aarakocra is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) damage to the target.

trait.name: Dance of the Seven Winds
entries: Asharra knows a ritual called the Dance of the Seven Winds, which temporarily grants magical flight to as many as ten nonflying creatures. The ritual, which takes 10 minutes to complete, can only be performed by an aarakocra elder and requires a black orchid as a material component.

Asharra must grind the orchid to powder, inhale it, and dance in circles around the ritual's beneficiaries uninterrupted while seven other aarakocra chant prayers to the Wind Dukes of Aaqa. When the dance concludes, Asharra's wings disappear and she loses the ability to fly. The ritual's beneficiaries each gain a magical flying speed of 30 feet (allowing them to fly 4 miles per hour). This benefit lasts for 3 days, after which Asharra's wings reappear and she regains the ability to fly.

action.name: Talon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Summon Air Elemental
entries: Five aarakocra within 30 feet of each other can magically summon an {@creature air elemental}. Each of the five must use its action and movement on three consecutive turns to perform an aerial dance and must maintain concentration while doing so (as if concentrating on a spell). When all five have finished their third turn of the dance, the elemental appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of them. It is friendly toward them and obeys their spoken commands. It remains for 1 hour, until it or all its summoners die, or until any of its summoners dismisses it as a bonus action. A summoner can't perform the dance again until it finishes a short rest. When the elemental returns to the Elemental Plane of Air, any aarakocra within 5 feet of it can return with it.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si assassin vine es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un normal plant.

action.name: Constrènyer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}The target takes 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent, and it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany de verí at the start of each of its turns. The vine can constrict only un objectiu at a time.

action.name: Entangling Vines
entries: The assassin vine can animate normal vines and roots on the ground in a 15-foot square within 30 feet of it. These plants turn the ground in that area into difficult terrain. A creature in that area when the effect begins ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 13} or be {@condition restrained} by entangling vines and roots. A creature {@condition restrained} by the plants can use its action to make a {@dc 13} Força (Atletisme) check, freeing itself on a successful check. The effect ends after 1 minute or when the assassin vine dies or uses Entangling Vines again.

monster.name: Atropal
languages: understands Celestial but utters only obscene nonsense

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The atropal té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Negative Energy Aura
entries: Creatures within 30 feet of the atropal can't regain hit points, and any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the atropal takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic. If the atropal is struck by a {@item vorpal sword}, the wielder can cut the atropal's umbilical cord instead of dealing damage. If its umbilical cord is cut, the atropal loses this feature.

trait.name: Turn Resistance Aura
entries: The atropal and any other undead creature within 30 feet of it té avantatge a salvar contra efectes que expulsin no-morts.

action.name: Tocar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Ray of Cold
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 12} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Drenar Vida
entries: The atropal targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 19}. Qui falli rep 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de dany necròtic; si supera, en rep la meitat. The atropal regains a number of hit points equal to half the amount of damage dealt.

action.name: Summon Wraith {@recharge}
entries: The atropal summons a {@creature wraith} which materializes within 30 feet of it in an unoccupied space it can see. The wraith obeys its summoner's commands and can't be controlled by any other creature. The Wraith vanishes when it drops to 0 hit points or when its summoner dies.

legendary.name: Tocar
entries: The atropal makes a touch attack.

legendary.name: Ray of Cold (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The atropal uses its Ray of Cold.

legendary.name: Wail (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The atropal lets out a withering wail. Any creature within 120 feet of the atropal that can hear the wail ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 19} or gain 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}.

trait.name: Feline Agility
entries: When Bag of Nails moves on its turn in combat, he can double his speed until the end of the turn. Once he uses this trait, Bag of Nails can't use it again until he moves 0 feet on one of his turns.

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During his first turn, Bag of Nails has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Bag of Nails scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Evasió
entries: If Bag of Nails is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Destresa saving throw to take only half damage, Bag of Nails instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Atac Furtiu (1/Torn)
entries: Bag of Nails deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of his that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and Bag of Nails doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Bag of Nails makes two shortsword attacks.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 24 ({@damage 7d6}) de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 24 ({@damage 7d6}) de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat.

monster.name: Blind Artist
senses: visió a cegues 30 peus (sense visió més enllà)

items.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Bosco wears a {@item ring of animal influence}.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The chwinga és Saviesa. Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament requiring no material or verbal components

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The chwinga doesn't require air, food, or drink. When it dies, it turns into a handful of flower petals, a cloud of pollen, a stone statuette resembling its former self, a tiny sphere of smooth stone, or a puddle of fresh water (your choice).

trait.name: Evasió
entries: When the chwinga is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Destresa saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

action.name: Magical Gift (1/Dia)
entries: The chwinga targets a humanoid it can see within 5 feet of it. The target gains a {@filter supernatural charm|rewards|type=charm} of the DM's choice. See {@book chapter 7|DMG|7|Other Rewards} of the Dungeon Masters Guide for more information on supernatural charms.

action.name: Natural Shelter
entries: The chwinga magically takes shelter inside a rock, a living plant, or a natural source of fresh water in its space. The chwinga can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect while inside this shelter, and the shelter doesn't impair the chwinga's visió a cegues. The chwinga can use it's action to emerge from a shelter. If its shelter is destroyed, the chwinga is forced out and appears in the shelter's space, but is otherwise unharmed.

trait.name: Climbing
entries: The gladiator pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Steadfast
entries: The gladiator can't be disarmed, and cannot make ranged attacks.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the gladiator hits with it (included in the attack).

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The gladiator fa tres atacs melé.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, o 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) de dany contundent. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 15} or be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: The gladiator adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the gladiator must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monster.name: Dragonbait
languages: understands Common però no pot parlar

trait.name: Divine Health
entries: Dragonbait is immune to disease.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: While holding his {@item holy avenger longsword||holy avenger longsword}, Dragonbait creates an aura in a 10-foot radius around him. While this aura is active, Dragonbait and all creatures friendly to him in the aura have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Dragonbait makes two melee weapon attacks.

action.name: Holy Avenger (+3 Longsword)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) de dany tallant, o 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dos mans. If the target is a fiend or an undead it takes an extra 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany radiant.

action.name: Sense Alignment
entries: Dragonbait chooses one creature he can see within 60 feet of him and determines its alignment, as long as the creature isn't hidden from divination magic by a spell or other magical effect.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The eblis és Intel·ligència ({@dc 11} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The eblis attacks twice with its beak.

action.name: Bec
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The flying monkey has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the monkey's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Familiar
entries: With the DM's permission, the {@spell find familiar} spell can summon a flying monkey.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) de dany perforant.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Quan the gargoyle es manté immòbil, és indistingible d'un inanimate statue .

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The gargoyle fa cinc atacs: one with its bite and four with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The turtle pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Stable
entries: Whenever an effect knocks the turtle {@condition prone}, it can make a {@dc 10} Constitució saving throw to avoid being knocked {@condition prone}. A {@condition prone} turtle is upside down. To stand up, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Destresa check on its turn and then use all its movement for that turn.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Agressivitat
entries: As a bonus action, the zombie can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Resiliència No-morta
entries: Si hi ha dany que redueix al zombi a 0 punts de cop, ha de salvar Constitució amb CD de 5 + el dany rebut (si el dany no és radiant o crític). Si supera, el zombi es queda amb 1 punt de cop i no 0.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The zombie fa cinc atacs: one with its bite and four with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: Hew has resistance to poison damage and advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of his turn, Hew can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against him have advantage until the start of his next turn.

action.name: Destral de guerra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Camouflage
entries: The jaculi has advantage on Destresa (Sigil) checks made to hide.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The jaculi has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Spring
entries: The jaculi springs up to 30 feet in a straight line and makes a bite attack against a target within its reach. This attack has advantage if the jaculi springs at least 10 feet. If the attack hits, the bite deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The kamadan has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Abraonar
entries: If the kamadan moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn that target ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 13} or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is knocked {@condition prone}, the kamadan can make two attacks—one with its bite and one with its snakes—against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The kamadan fa dos atacs: one with its bite or claw and one with its snakes.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Snakes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12}. Qui falli rep 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Sleep Breath (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The kamadan exhales sleep gas en un con de 30 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12} or fall {@condition unconscious} for 10 minutes. This effect ends for a creature if it takes damage or someone uses an action to wake it.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The King of Feathers és Saviesa. It can innately cast the following spell, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Detect Invisibility
entries: The King of Feathers can see {@condition invisible} creatures and objects as if they were visible.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the King of Feathers falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The King of Feathers fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}33 ({@damage 4d12 + 7}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the tyrannosaurus can't bite another target.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Summon Swarm {@recharge 5}
entries: The King of Feathers exhales a {@creature swarm of wasps||swarm of insects (wasps)} that forms in a space within 20 feet of it. The swarm acts as an ally of the King of Feathers and takes its turn immediately after it. The swarm disperses after 1 minute. It can't use the Summon Swarm action while it is grappling a creature with its jaws.

items.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Laskilar wears a {@item cape of the mountebank}.

trait.name: Coratge
entries: Liara has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Flaming Fury
entries: Un cop per torn, when Liara hits a creature with a melee weapon, she can cause fire to magically erupt from her weapon and deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de foc to the target.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Liara fa tres atacs melé.

action.name: Destral de guerra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, o 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dos mans.

action.name: Ballesta Pesada
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Attractive Pollen (1/Dia)
entries: When the mantrap detects any creatures nearby, it can use its reaction to release pollen out to a radius of 30 feet. Any beast or humanoid within the area ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 11} or be forced to use all its movement on its turns to get as close to the the mantrap as possible. An affected target can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Quan the mantrap es manté immòbil, és indistingible d'un tropical plant ordinary.

action.name: Engulf
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}The target is trapped inside the mantrap's leafy jaws. While trapped in this way, the target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, has total cover from an attacks and other effects outside the mantrap, and takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the target's turns. If the mantrap dies, the creature inside it is no longer {@condition restrained} by it. A mantrap can engulf only one creature at a time.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Mwaxanaré és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 2. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Carisma ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Recupera les ranures de conjur quan acaba un Descans Curt o Llarg. Coneix els encanteris de bruixot següents:

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 2} a impactar. 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Terror Dive
entries: If the pterafolk is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target, and then hits that target with a melee weapon attack, the target is {@condition frightened} fins el final del seu proper torn.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The pterafolk fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws. Alternatively, it makes two melee attacks with its javelin.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

hp.special: 127 (17d8+51) reduced to 107; subtract 1 for each day that passes during the adventure

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de Ras Nsi's és Saviesa ({@dc 16} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Ras Nsi is an 11th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència ({@dc 15} salvada de conjur, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics).
Ras Nsi has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Ras Nsi wears {@item bracers of defense}, wields a {@item flame tongue longsword}, and carries a {@item sending stones||sending stone} matched to the one carried by the guide Salida (see chapter 1).

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: Ras Nsi can use his action to polymorph into a Medium snake or back into his yuan-ti form. His statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. He doesn't change form if he dies.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Ras Nsi té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Ras Nsi makes three melee attacks, but can use Constrict only once.

action.name: Bite (Snake Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Constrènyer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 14} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and Ras Nsi can't constrict another target.

action.name: Flame Tongue Longsword (Yuan-ti Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, o 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dos mans, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc.

items.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Sekelok té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Sekelok's spellcasting ability is Carisma ({@dc 13} salvació de conjur). Sekelok pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

items.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The skeleton pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The skeleton makes two dagger attacks.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Spiked Tomb Guardian

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics que no siguin d'adamantí

languages: comprèn els idiomes dels seus creadors però no pot parlar

trait.name: Bersèrk
entries: Quan el tomb guardian comenci el seu torn amb 40 punts de cop o menys, tira {@dice d6}. Si surt un 6 el tomb guardian es torna bersèrk. A cada torn així ataca a la criatura que tingui més a prop i pugui veure. Si no n'hi ha cap prou a prop per moure's i atacar-la, atacarà a un objecte (preferentment més petit). Quan el tomb guardian sigui bersèrk no parara fins que sigui destruit o recuperi tots els punts de cop. Si el creador del tomb guardian hi és a 60 peus d'abast pot intentar calmar-lo com a acció. El tomb guardian l'ha de poder sentir. El creador farà una tirada de Carisma (Persuasión) amb {@dc 15}. Si supera, el bersèrk s'acaba pel tomb guardian. Si el tomb guardian torna a rebre mal estant a 40 punts de cop o menys, pot tornar a activar-se el bersèrk.

trait.name: Aversió al Foc
entries: Si the tomb guardian rep dany de foc té desavantatge a tirades d'impactar i d'habilitat fins el final del seu proper torn.

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The tomb guardian és immune a tot conjur o efecte que vulgui alterar-li la forma.

trait.name: Absorbir Electricitat
entries: Quan the tomb guardian hagi de rebre dany elèctric, no rep mal sinò que recupera la meitat de dany elèctric en punts de cop.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The tomb guardian té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The gòlem's són màgics.

trait.name: Chained
entries: {@note This trait applies when two guardians are chained together.}

A magical spiked chain that binds a pair of guardians together prevents them from moving more than 15 feet apart. Additionally, as long as the chain is intact, damage dealt to either guardian is divided evenly between them. The spiked chain can be attacked separately and has AC 18, a damage threshold of 10, 5 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage. If the chain breaks, both tomb guardians instantly go berserk.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The tomb guardian makes two spiked gauntlet attacks.

action.name: Spiked Gauntlet
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent mes 9 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany perforant.

walk.condition: (in one direction chosen at the start of its turn)

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons

trait.name: Devastating Roll
entries: The juggernaut can move through the space of a {@condition prone} creature. A creature whose space the juggernaut enters for the first time on a turn ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 17}. Qui falli rep 55 ({@damage 10d10}) de dany contundent; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The juggernaut és immune a tot conjur o efecte que vulgui alterar-li la forma.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: As long as it has 1 hit point left, the juggernaut magically regains all its hit points daily at dawn. The juggernaut is destroyed and doesn't regenerate if it drops to 0 hit points.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The juggernaut fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d12 + 6}) de dany contundent. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 17} or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The su-monster fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) de dany tallant, o 12 ({@damage 4d4 + 2}) de dany tallant if the su-monster is hanging by its tail and all four of its limbs are free.

action.name: Psychic Crush {@recharge 5}
entries: The su-monster targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 11}  qui falli rep 17 ({@damage 5d6}) de dany psíquic i està {@condition stunned} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu {@condition stunned} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

trait.name: Feline Agility
entries: When the tabaxi moves on its turn in combat, it can double its speed until the end of the turn. Once it uses this ability, the tabaxi can't use it again until it moves 0 feet on one of its turns.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The tabaxi fa dos atacs with its claws, its shortsword, or its shortbow.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Feline Agility
entries: When the tabaxi moves on its turn in combat, it can double its speed until the end of the turn. Once it uses this ability, the tabaxi can't use it again until it moves 0 feet on one of its turns.

trait.name: Inspire (1/Dia)
entries: While taking a short rest, the tabaxi can spend 1 minute singing, playing an instrument, telling a story, or reciting a poem to soothe and inspire creatures other than itself. Up to five creatures of the tabaxi's choice that can see and hear its performance gain 8 temporary hit points at the end of the tabaxi's short rest.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The tabaxi makes two claws attacks or two dart attacks.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, range 20/ 60 ft., un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

items.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si terracotta warrior es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un terracotta statue.

items.name: Fràgil
entries: If a critical hit is scored against the terracotta warrior, it shatters and is destroyed.

items.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Tomb Dwarf

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the tomb dwarf has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The tomb dwarf makes two longsword attacks or two crossbow attacks. It can use its Drenar Vida in place of one longsword attack.

action.name: Drenar Vida
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany necròtic. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13} or se li redueixen tants punts de cop màxims com dany hagi rebut. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. L'objectiu mor si aquest efecte li redueix els punts de cop màxim a 0.A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a zombie under the tomb dwarf's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The tomb dwarf can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.

action.name: Destral de guerra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany tallant, o 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Ballesta Lleugera
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Tomb Guardian

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics que no siguin d'adamantí

languages: comprèn els idiomes dels seus creadors però no pot parlar

trait.name: Bersèrk
entries: Quan el tomb guardian comenci el seu torn amb 40 punts de cop o menys, tira {@dice d6}. Si surt un 6 el tomb guardian es torna bersèrk. A cada torn així ataca a la criatura que tingui més a prop i pugui veure. Si no n'hi ha cap prou a prop per moure's i atacar-la, atacarà a un objecte (preferentment més petit). Quan el tomb guardian sigui bersèrk no parara fins que sigui destruit o recuperi tots els punts de cop. Si el creador del tomb guardian hi és a 60 peus d'abast pot intentar calmar-lo com a acció. El tomb guardian l'ha de poder sentir. El creador farà una tirada de Carisma (Persuasión) amb {@dc 15}. Si supera, el bersèrk s'acaba pel tomb guardian. Si el tomb guardian torna a rebre mal estant a 40 punts de cop o menys, pot tornar a activar-se el bersèrk.

trait.name: Aversió al Foc
entries: Si the tomb guardian rep dany de foc té desavantatge a tirades d'impactar i d'habilitat fins el final del seu proper torn.

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The tomb guardian és immune a tot conjur o efecte que vulgui alterar-li la forma.

trait.name: Absorbir Electricitat
entries: Quan the tomb guardian hagi de rebre dany elèctric, no rep mal sinò que recupera la meitat de dany elèctric en punts de cop.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The tomb guardian té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The gòlem's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The tomb guardian makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The tri-flower frond uses its orange blossom, then its yellow blossom, and then its red blossom.

action.name: Orange Blossom
entries: The tri-flower frond chooses one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 11} or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target is {@condition unconscious}. At the end of each minute, the {@condition poisoned} target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Yellow Blossom
entries: The tri-flower frond chooses one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 11}, or it is covered with corrosive sap and takes 5 acid damage at the start of each of its turns. Dousing the target with water reduces the acid damage by 1 point per pint or flask of water used.

action.name: Red Blossom
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 11} per escapar). Until this grapple ends, the target takes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany de verí at the start of each of its turns. The red blossom can grapple only un objectiu at a time. Another creature within abast of the tri-flower frond can use its action to end the grapple on the target.

trait.name: Disgorge Zombie
entries: As a bonus action, the tyrannosaurus zombie can disgorge a normal {@creature zombie}, which appears in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of it. The disgorged {@creature zombie} acts on its own initiative count. After a zombie is disgorged, roll a {@dice d6}. On a roll of 1, the tyrannosaurus zombie runs out of zombies to disgorge and loses this trait. If the tyrannosaurus zombie still has this trait when it dies, {@dice 1d4} normal zombies erupt from its corpse at the start of its next turn. These zombies act on their own initiative count.

trait.name: Resiliència No-morta
entries: If damage reduces the tyrannosaurus zombie to 0 hit points, ha de salvar per Constitució with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The tyrannosaurus zombie fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}33 ({@damage 4d12 + 7}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained} and the tyrannosaurus zombie can't bite another target or disgorge zombies.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Valindra is an 18th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència ({@dc 20} salvada de conjur, {@hit 12} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Mask
entries: As a bonus action, Valindra can mask her shriveled flesh and appear to be a living elf. This magical illusion lasts until she ends it as a bonus action or until she uses her Frightening Gaze legendary action. The effect also ends if Valindra drops to 30 hit points or fewer, or if dispel magic is cast on her.

trait.name: Preparation
entries: When preparing her spells, Valindra can swap out any spell on her list of prepared spells for another wizard spell of the same level.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Valindra falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Rejovenir
entries: If destroyed Valindra gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all her hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

trait.name: Resistir l'Expulsió
entries: Valindra té avantatge a salvar contra efectes que expulsin no-morts.

action.name: Paralyzing Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 12} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18} or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: Valindra casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Paralyzing Touch (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Valindra uses her Paralyzing Touch.

legendary.name: Frightening Gaze (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Valindra fixes her gaze on one creature she can see within 10 feet of her. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 18} against this magic or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. L'objectiu {@condition frightened} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the Valindra's gaze for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Disrupt Life (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Each non-undead creature within 20 feet of Valindra ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18} against this magic. Qui falli rep 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany necròtic; si supera, en rep la meitat.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Volo és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 1. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 12} salvada de conjur, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Withers

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

languages: the languages he knew in life

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Withers és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Withers carries the {@item amulet of the black skull|ToA}.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, Withers has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Withers makes two longsword attacks. He can use his Drenar Vida in place of one longsword attack.

action.name: Drenar Vida
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany necròtic. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13} or se li redueixen tants punts de cop màxims com dany hagi rebut. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. L'objectiu mor si aquest efecte li redueix els punts de cop màxim a 0.

A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a zombie under the Withers's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. Withers can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany tallant, o 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Xandala és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de fetiller preparats:

trait.name: Quickened Spell (3/Dia)
entries: When she casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, Xandala changes the casting time to 1 bonus action for that casting.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent, o 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dos mans.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Quan the creeper es manté immòbil, és indistingible d'un flowering vine ordinary.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The creeper recupera 10 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If the creeper takes fire, necrotic, or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The creeper dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Tocar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany psíquic. If the target is a humanoid that drops to 0 hit points as a result of this damage, it dies and is implanted with a yellow musk creeper bulb. Unless the bulb is destroyed, the corpse animates as a yellow musk zombie after being dead for 24 hours. The bulb is destroyed if the creature is raised from the dead before it can transform into a yellow musk zombie, or if the corpse is targeted by a {@spell remove curse} spell or similar magic before it animates.

action.name: Yellow Musk (3/Dia)
entries: The creeper's flowers release a strong musk that targets all humanoids within 30 feet of it. Each target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 11} or be {@condition charmed} by the creeper for 1 minute. A creature {@condition charmed} in this way does nothing on its turn except move as close as it can to the creeper. A creature {@condition charmed} by the creeper can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Resiliència No-morta
entries: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, ha de salvar per Constitució with a DC of 5 +the damage taken, unless the damage is fire or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Form Only)
headerEntries: The yuan-ti's innate spellcasting ability is Carisma ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The yuan-ti pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Zindar és un llançador de conjurs de nivell 14. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Carisma ({@dc 15} salvada de conjur, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Coneix els encanteris de fetiller següents:

trait.name: Dragon Wings
entries: As a bonus action on his turn, Zindar can sprout a pair of dragon wings from his back, gaining a flying speed of 30 feet until he dismisses them as a bonus action.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent, o 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dos mans.

action.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge 5}
entries: Zindar uses one of the following options:

action.name: Fire Breath
entries: Zindar exhales fire en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Weakening Breath
entries: Zindar exhales gas en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 15} or have disadvantage on Força-based attack rolls, Força checks, and Força saving throws for 1 minute. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The zorbo té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armadura Natural
entries: The zorbo magically absorbs the natural strength of its surroundings, adjusting its Armor Class based on the material it is standing or climbing on: AC 15 for wood or bone, AC 17 for earth or stone, or AC 19 for metal. If the zorbo isn't in contact with any of these substances, its AC is 10.

action.name: Destructive Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d6 + 1}) de dany tallant, and if the target is a creature wearing armor, carrying a shield, or in possession of a magic item that improves its AC, it ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 11}. Si falla, one such item worn or carried by the creature (the target's choice) magically deteriorates, taking a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to the AC it offers, and the zorbo gains a +1 bonus to AC until the start of its next turn. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield or magic item that drops to a 0 AC increase is destroyed.
